greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = m - A089398(2^m - n) for m>=n.
comment: A089398(n) = n-th column sum of binary digits of k*2^(k-1), where summation is over k>=1, without carrying between columns.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 30 2003
